text: A rotting carcass that will sicken and fatigue the target.
A container of vile effluent that will terrify and demoralise the target.
Has greater range but causes less damage.
Does more damage, but is less powerful against armour and slower to reload. Can cause buildings and some vegetation to catch fire.
This is the standard shot type for this unit.
This is the standard shot type for this unit.
Causes less damage but has a fearsome sound. Adversely affects the morale, melee attack & firing rate of targets & any unit they pass over.
Does more damage than Standard Round, but is less accurate. Most effective against infantry.
Reduces enemy melee attack and defence, and fatigues the target unit. Does less damage.
Does more damage, but is less accurate and slower. Can cause buildings to catch fire.
Causes greater damage but has shorter range & reduced accuracy.
